sentences.en: Back of the breakwater the dredger was working.
sentences.cn: 在防波堤后面挖泥船正在工作.

sentences.en: Comb - like breakwater and rubble mound breakwater with pressure - relieving inverted - L breast wall are innovations of breakwater structures.
sentences.cn: 梳 式 防波堤和带减压倒L型胸墙的斜坡堤都是防波堤结构的创新.

sentences.en: Once outside the inner breakwater, we began to unfurl all the sails.
sentences.cn: 一驶出内防波堤，我们就扬起了所有的船帆。

sentences.en: Over by the breakwater sea very high.
sentences.cn: 海浪很高,甚至都越过了防浪堤.

sentences.en: Permeable breakwater is economical and reasonable in deep water area with lowr and steep waves.
sentences.cn: 在水深较大、高较小而波陡较大的水域,透空式防波堤在经济上和结构上都是比较合理的.

sentences.en: Robert Hermansson: < The Great East India Adventure >, by Breakwater Publishing.
sentences.cn: 注: 本文主要史料源自瑞典“破浪出版公司”出版的罗伯特·曼逊所著《伟大的东亚探险》一书.

sentences.en: Steiner and Ilse were at the very end of the breakwater.
sentences.cn: 施泰纳和艾尔丝呆在港口防波堤的顶端.

sentences.en: The actual breakwater itself will be built on a foundation of slag—a permeable byproduct of steel which will provide a habitat for aquatic wildlife in the lake.
sentences.cn: 事实上，防浪堤本身是建在矿渣（具有渗透性的钢铁的副产物）上的，这能为水中的生物营造良好的生活环境。

sentences.en: The breakwater projects far into the sea.
sentences.cn: 防波堤一直伸向远处的海面.

sentences.en: The breakwater sustains the shock of the great waves.
sentences.cn: 防波堤承受巨浪的冲击.

sentences.en: The design of the breakwater was based on the recommendations of an engineering study.
sentences.cn: 这道防浪堤的设计是建立在工程学研究建议的基础上的.

sentences.en: The face celluar structure breakwater is a new developed structure type of breakwater.
sentences.cn: 弧面格型结构防波堤是一种新开发的防波堤结构型式.

sentences.en: The model tests results indicate that the multiple breakwater has the good characteristics of dissipating waves.
sentences.cn: 试验结果表明,该结构具有良好的消浪性能,且对波浪的反射作用较弱.

sentences.en: The rocks for Dubai's breakwater have been provided by its neighbour Abu Dhabi.
sentences.cn: 为迪拜防波堤提供石料的是其邻国阿布扎比.

sentences.en: The wave heights behind submerged semi - circular breakwater shall be superimposed by diffracted and transmitted wave heights.
sentences.cn: 半圆型潜堤后的波高将由绕射波高与传递波高迭加而成.

sentences.en: They riprapped the breakwater with stone.
sentences.cn: 他们以乱石基巩固防波堤.

phrases.tran_cn: 堆石防波堤；斜坡式防波堤

trans.tran_en: a wall built out into the sea to protect the shore from the force of the waves
